date.description: The date the post was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the post was published, as GMT.

guid.description: The globally unique identifier for the post.

raw.description: GUID for the post, as it exists in the database.

rendered.description: GUID for the post, transformed for display.

modified.description: The date the post was last modified, in the site's timezone.

modified_gmt.description: The date the post was last modified, as GMT.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the post unique to its type.

status.description: A named status for the post.

password.description: A password to protect access to the content and excerpt.

generated_slug.description: Slug automatically generated from the post title.

class_list.description: An array of the class names for the post container element.

raw.description: Title for the post, as it exists in the database.

rendered.description: HTML title for the post, transformed for display.

raw.description: Content for the post, as it exists in the database.

rendered.description: HTML content for the post, transformed for display.

block_version.description: Version of the content block format used by the post.

protected.description: Whether the content is protected with a password.

author.description: The ID for the author of the post.

raw.description: Excerpt for the post, as it exists in the database.

rendered.description: HTML excerpt for the post, transformed for display.

protected.description: Whether the excerpt is protected with a password.

featured_media.description: The ID of the featured media for the post.

comment_status.description: Whether or not comments are open on the post.

ping_status.description: Whether or not the post can be pinged.

sticky.description: Whether or not the post should be treated as sticky.

template.description: The theme file to use to display the post.

categories.description: The terms assigned to the post in the category taxonomy.

tags.description: The terms assigned to the post in the post_tag taxonomy.

links.title: The current user can publish this post.
The current user can post unfiltered HTML markup and JavaScript.
The current user can sticky this post.
The current user can change the author on this post.
The current user can assign terms in the category taxonomy.
The current user can create terms in the category taxonomy.
The current user can assign terms in the post_tag taxonomy.
The current user can create terms in the post_tag taxonomy.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page of the collection.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Limit response to posts published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

parameters.name: modified_after
parameters.description: Limit response to posts modified after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts assigned to specific authors.

parameters.name: author_exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes posts assigned to specific authors.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Limit response to posts published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

parameters.name: modified_before
parameters.description: Limit response to posts modified before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

parameters.name: search_semantics
parameters.description: How to interpret the search input.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Sort collection by post attribute.

parameters.name: search_columns
parameters.description: Array of column names to be searched.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts with one or more specific slugs.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts assigned one or more statuses.

parameters.name: tax_relation
parameters.description: Limit result set based on relationship between multiple taxonomies.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Limit result set to items with specific terms assigned in the categories taxonomy.

oneOf.title: Term ID List
oneOf.description: Match terms with the listed IDs.

include_children.description: Whether to include child terms in the terms limiting the result set.

operator.description: Whether items must be assigned all or any of the specified terms.

parameters.name: categories_exclude
parameters.description: Limit result set to items except those with specific terms assigned in the categories taxonomy.

oneOf.title: Term ID List
oneOf.description: Match terms with the listed IDs.

include_children.description: Whether to include child terms in the terms limiting the result set.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Limit result set to items with specific terms assigned in the tags taxonomy.

oneOf.title: Term ID List
oneOf.description: Match terms with the listed IDs.

operator.description: Whether items must be assigned all or any of the specified terms.

parameters.name: tags_exclude
parameters.description: Limit result set to items except those with specific terms assigned in the tags taxonomy.

oneOf.title: Term ID List
oneOf.description: Match terms with the listed IDs.

parameters.name: sticky
parameters.description: Limit result set to items that are sticky.

parameters.name: ignore_sticky
parameters.description: Whether to ignore sticky posts or not.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Limit result set to items assigned one or more given formats.
